actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national museum.

summary.text: Directs the Atomic Energy Commission to establish and maintain a National Nuclear Museum in the State of New Mexico for the advancement of public knowledge on the development and use of nuclear energy. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national museum.
